txt.en: 'You drew this, [placeholder]? Why, this is even better than the original! I appreciate the detail you put in. Have you not considered a career in map-making?\n\n'Whenever I travel the Winding Way, I will think of you. You have my thanks.'
Mapping the Winding Way

The Winding Way is to the east, and connects the Chamber of the Cross-roads with the Twenty-first Hall.\n\nThálfi has asked you to map the Winding Way and Twenty-first Hall to the east of the Chamber of the Cross-roads.

Speak to Thálfi in the Chamber of the Cross-roads
You have found a good section to draw on the parchment
You have drawn the Twenty-first Hall on the parchment
You have found a good location to draw on the parchment
Thálfi is in need of someone to map the Winding Way, the path between the Chamber of the Cross-roads and the Twenty-first Hall.

'There are few places in the world as large and mystifying as Khazad-dûm. With its wide chasms and twisting paths... it is easy to become disoriented! Because of this, I have been working hard on obtaining detailed maps of each hall and pathway we secure.

'Directly to the east you will find a passage known as the Winding Way. I had a beautiful map, detailing each section of the path, stretching all the way to the Twenty-first Hall... but some of the careless guards here placed their mugs of ale and various other liquids directly on top of it. They have utterly ruined it!

'I need a replacement and it must be accurate. Would you take this parchment and detail a new map for me, [placeholder]?'
